vendor_name: Discovery Parks - Fraser Street, Hervey Bay
title: Family-Friendly Hervey Bay Escape with Two Swimming Pools, Tennis Court & Deluxe Safari Tent Upgrade
description: Experience the natural beauty of Hervey Bay with a stay at this coastal park, set on eight acres of subtropical gardens and perfectly positioned for exploring the region's stunning beaches, marine life, vibrant dining scene and the nearby Fraser Island. Enjoy a glamping experience with all the comforts of home in a beautifully designed and well-equipped safari tent. When you're not out exploring, enjoy the park's many amenities, including two sparkling pools, a tennis court, BBQ facilities and an activity room - plus there's plenty of spots for a leisurely picnic lunch. For dining, head to the nearby Boat Harbour Drive precinct, offering a variety of local eateries serving fresh seafood and international cuisine. Hervey Bay is renowned as a whale-watching destination - if visiting between July and October, be sure to see them play in the bay's warm waters.
location_description: Discovery Parks - Fraser Street, Hervey Bay
